name: Paddle Pandemonium
description:
1-2 Players 

Blue Player: WASD

Red Player: Arrow Keys

Restart Key: R

Quit: esc

A black wall connects both red and blue orbs it is made of a strange indestructible material use this wall to reflect attacks back at enemies. The wall is fused to both players so careful coordination and cooperation is required to maintain control over the device.

Try and achieve a high score 

game resets on death or on the restart key (R)
